data.name: Warface
data.detailed_description:
Just Updated



We have installed a new game version of the seasonal update "Snowstorm". It features new content, weapon tweaks and reinforcement of the game defense system. We have also turned down the annoying sounds of fireworks on festive winter maps and fixed some bugs of the previous versions.

Previous Version

NEW CONTENT





BARRETT MRAD MK22

The sniper rifle has a good set of perks - high base and minimum damage rates, as well as excellent damage multipliers to the body and limbs. This makes it very likely for its holder to one-shot even a well-equipped enemy. The advantages are offset by a very low hip-fire accuracy, strong recoil and low (compared to the closest competitors - CheyTac M200 Special, Alpine Special and AMP DSR-1 Custom) ADS speed.
The golden version has increased damage and a larger magazine.

OTHER

  • Added a set of achievements and a weapon charm of the Warface PRO season.
  • Added thematic content: Carved Bone Balisong Knife, weapon charm and a set of achievements (mark, badge and stripe).

CONTENT CHANGES



REINFORCEMENT OF THE GAME DEFENCE SYSTEM

  • Now, spammers using double climb to end a game session early will be kicked from the match.
  • Fixed a vulnerability that allowed launching the game client without the anti-cheat.

TWEAKS TO WEAPONS

  • AUG A3 9mm XS Custom (all versions): increased rate of fire (from 755 to 760), increased minimum damage, reduced damage drop at a distance, reduced reload time, increased the weapon change speed and the ADS speed.
  • AUG A3 9mm XS Custom (only the regular version): added the possibility to mount collimator sights Truglo and EOTech 553.

OTHER

  • Turned down the volume of exploding fireworks on festive winter maps.
  • Modification system: improved mods display on the mod creation screen - now, there is one mod type in each column.
  • In-game event: improved readability of the event timer. It is now located in the upper left corner of the event banner in the main menu interface.

BUG FIXES



IMPORTANT

  • Fixed some reasons for game client crashes.
  • Fixed a bug due to which the defence system could kick players from special operations if they fired from some types of shotguns.
  • Hydra: fixed a bug due to which the incorrect amount of Battle Pass experience was given for completing the operation. Current values:
    - 20 stages: 120 experience points (instead of 160)
    - full completion: 200 experience points (instead of 160).

WEAPONS AND GEAR

  • The repair values of the "Snowstorm" gear are now correct.
  • Golden Ruger Mk IV Lite: fixed bugs due to which, after the player's death, the pistol would be dropped, and could be picked up; its magazine and ammunition counters were missing, and kills made with the model did not count for the achievement progress.
  • Fixed a bug due to which in the mod creation window, modifications that increase the rate of fire of shotguns could be displayed incorrectly.
  • Festive S&W M&P R8: fixed a bug due to which the unique sight of the pistol was black.
  • S&W M&P R8: fixed a bug due to which some elements of visual geometry were not displayed when using the festive camouflage.
  • Tavor CTAR-21 Special "Tundra": fixed a bug due to which some specs of the weapon were displayed incorrectly.
  • KAC PDW, Quarter Circle 10 SMG Custom: fixed a bug due to which some attachments remained black when using the "Shroud" camouflage.
  • Grand Power SR9A2 "Crystal": fixed a visual error due to which incorrect specs were displayed for weapons in the Inventory and the shop due to the wrong model type.
  • Quarter Circle 10 SMG: fixed a bug due to which the reload speed of the model was not synchronised with the technical values. In addition, sounds now match the reload rate and are not played after the weapon change.
  • AS Val Custom: fixed a bug due to which, in the third-person view, the model was displayed with visual artefacts in the hands of the character in the Inventory or the shop.
  • AUG A3 9mm XS Custom: fixed a bug due to which, when viewed from the third person in the menu, lobby or shop, the weapon sight was hanging in the air.

PVE AND SO

  • Swarm: fixed some reasons due to which beetles' hits did not always deal damage to the player.
  • Heist: fixed a bug due to which, in some cases, the SWAT Heavy Gunner did not reload the gun.
  • Fixed a bug due to which, in some cases, Heavy Soldiers' hits did not always deal damage to the player.
  • Sunrise: fixed a bug that caused opponents to teleport after landing on a jetpack.
  • Operation Blackwood, Heist: fixed a bug due to which the player could be kicked for inactivity while watching the cutscene.

OTHER

  • Fixed a bug due to which, after the end of the in-game event, the currency continued to be granted for completed matches.
  • Fixed a bug due to which, after finding a match, the player who on the Shooting Range would return to the starting position (the one when entering the Shooting Range).
  • Fixed a bug due to which, in some cases, the Private Room screen was not be displayed.
  • Fixed a bug due to which the Apostate Cobray Striker Special stripe had an incorrect icon.
  • Fixed a bug due to which the "Snowstorm" contract had an incorrect reward icon.
  • Fixed a bug due to which a task of the "Sniper training" contract could not be completed in "Black Shark".
  • Fixed a bug due to which some Special Operations did not count towards the progress of some contracts.
  • Fixed a bug due to which cells with missing mods in the mod menu were displayed incorrectly.

Learn more: https://pc.warface.com/en/news/1226739.html


About the Game

Warface is a contemporary MMO first person shooter with millions of fans around the world. It offers intense PvP modes, compelling PvE missions and raids that you can challenge with five diverse classes and a colossal customizable arsenal.

Intense PvP


Over ten multiplayer modes with dozens of maps – from time proven shooter classics to fresh experiments, as well the elaborated system of ranked matches with unique rewards await its heroes.

Compelling PvE


Play with your friends in exciting online missions or try yourself in full-scale raids with several difficulty levels and epic loot.

Diverse classes


Rifleman, Medic, Engineer, Sniper and SED are at your service: assault the defenses of your enemies, revive your teammates, mine the corridors, take down the foes with precise shots or tank the enemy's counter-attack - here you decide how to act!

Enormous customizable arsenal


Hundreds of weapons are at your disposal, customizable with a range of scopes, grips, flash guards, and camo to get the best performance tailored to your preference.

Jump into action and play for free!

data.reviews:
“Warface is a military shooter built on a bedrock of satisfying gunplay, slick movement, and sharp visuals.”
PCGamesN

“Warface is a gritty looking first person shooter that focuses primarily on online multiplayer. It doesn’t feature abilities like wall running, jetpacks, or special attacks, but that doesn’t hurt the game. It takes on the more realistic, boots on the ground type of gameplay.”
Gaming Trend

“Warface equally focuses on a handful of PvP game modes, as well as cooperative game modes, such as special operations that will require deliberate planning and teamwork if you want to succeed.”
SelectButton
